div1.p: Thank you for returning the agreement covering publication of BLACK ELK SPEAKS. There may be a slight delay in returning the completed agreement of the Board of Regents until late August.
We plan to publish BLACK ELK SPEAKS next spring. I would be grateful to receive the new foreword by September 1. I assume this replaces the earlier foreword.

For some time we have been interested in publishing a biography of you which will appear in a series concerned with modern writers, the first in the series being on Wright Morris and appearing this fall. About a year ago I wrote a lady by the name of Mrs. Bower Aly of Eugene, Oregon who is at work on such a writing project. Do you know her and of her projected biography? We would very much like to have her at least give us an opportunity to see it.
div1.closer: Cordially yours, UNIVERSITY OF NEBRASKA PRESS Bruce H. Nicoll Director
